scripts.build: echo 'Please ensure the popup code has been built!' && shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist/background && shx cp -r src/background dist && shx cp -r src/discord dist && shx cp -r src/popup/dist dist/popup && shx cp -r src/youtube dist && shx cp -r src/assets dist && shx cp -r src/manifest.json dist
